price: Mnamdhania nini Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote?
footnotes: Mnamdhania nini huyo ambaye ndiye Mwenye haki ya kuabudiwa kwa kuwa Yeye ndiye Muumba walimwengu wote, mtapo kutana naye na hali nyinyi mmemfanyia washirika wenginewe katika ibada?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
